cause.description:
One child dying in war should be enough to stop any conflict from continuing for any civilization that claims to place a value on human life.
Pre-Emptive war is a crime against humanity morally at the very least if not legally and we want anyone who shares this view to have a voice.
If you believe that all people should have a right to an opportunity to live in peace without fear and all with equal consideration for their own intrinsic value then please take a step toward peace and add your name for peace at http://www.namesforpeace.com
just click on the link and sign up!
This simple, safe, and private two minute step toward peace could contribute to saving hundreds of thousands of people from being needlessly destroyed in the process of national conflicts that take place throughout the world on a regular basis. All governments need to know that the world is demanding peace, equality and safety for all people of every origin.
1. Equality is a human experience not a conceptual idea.
2. Within the experience of human equality war is impossible
3. Every act of war is a crime against humanity
4. Everyone who wants peace can create a voice together that can not be ignored
cause.mission: Connect a World Community of Peace Demanding People
cause.name: Names for Peace
